description:
[Android] Upload instrumentation results to flakiness dashboard.

Upload to the staging server and only on the FYI bot.

BUG=150801
TEST=bb_run_bot_test.py

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=177186

messages.text:
Looks good to me with a couple minor changes.  You can verify the right thing is happening with:

./bb_run_bot.py --TESTING --bot-id fyi-tests

Sorry, rietveld ate my comments!

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/11972003/diff/1/build/android/buildbot/bb_device_steps.py
File build/android/buildbot/bb_device_steps.py (right):

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/11972003/diff/1/build/android/buildbot/bb_device_steps.py#newcode285
build/android/buildbot/bb_device_steps.py:285: parser.add_option('--flakiness-dashboard-server', action='store_true',
Could we change this to '--upload-flakiness-results'?

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/11972003/diff/1/build/android/buildbot/bb_device_steps.py#newcode286
build/android/buildbot/bb_device_steps.py:286: help=('Upload the results to the flakiness dashboard.'))
nit: no parens needed for help string

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/11972003/diff/1/build/android/buildbot/bb_run_bot.py
File build/android/buildbot/bb_run_bot.py (right):

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/11972003/diff/1/build/android/buildbot/bb_run_bot.py#newcode99
build/android/buildbot/bb_run_bot.py:99: B('try-fyi-tests', std_test_steps, T(std_tests, ['--experimental']),
nit: move below perf-tests-rel.  This list is alphabetical.

--TESTING is awesome!

https://codereview.chromium.org/11972003/diff/1/build/android/buildbot/bb_device_steps.py
File build/android/buildbot/bb_device_steps.py (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/11972003/diff/1/build/android/buildbot/bb_device_steps.py#newcode285
build/android/buildbot/bb_device_steps.py:285: parser.add_option('--flakiness-dashboard-server', action='store_true',
On 2013/01/16 03:11:26, Isaac wrote:
> Could we change this to '--upload-flakiness-results'?

Done.

build/android/buildbot/bb_device_steps.py:286: help=('Upload the results to the flakiness dashboard.'))
